filters.q: ("gift message" OR "gift order" OR "gift") AND ("confirmation" OR "shipped" OR "shipping") AND (category:purchases)

assignments.name: gifts_string

values.content:
=Below are gift records. Let's try and determine the event of the gift and potentially important dates. Assume gifts bought just before Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, and Christmas are gifts for those holidays. Assume all other gifts are birthday gifts. Assume all gifts are timely purchased, at the latest 1 day before the event. Therefore a gift bought on May 15 is more likely to be a birthday than a Mother's Day gift, since it would be too late. Similarly, a gift on December 28 is too late to be a Christmas gift, February 15 is too late to be a Valentine's Day gift, and June 22 is too late to be a Father's Day gift.

<Holiday Dates>
- Mother's Day: May 8 - May 14, varies
- Father's Day: June 15 - June 21, varies
- Christmas Day: December 25
- Valentine's Day: February 14
</Holiday Dates>

For each individual gift item, please update JSON like the following:

    {
      "event": "mothers_day" or "fathers_day" or "christmas" or "valentines_day" or "birthday",
      "estimated_birthday": "Early August" or "Mid September" or "Late May or Early June" (if "event" === "birthday", this is likely 1-1.5 weeks after purchase date, otherwise return null),
      <include existing fields>
    }

Return only JSON, nothing else. Do not include triple backticks denoting JSON format, just the raw JSON.

<GIFT DATA>
{{ $json.toJsonString() }}
</GIFT DATA>

Pay special attention to the date. Take a deep breath. Think step-by-step.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "recipient": "Carol McGarry",
  "item_name": "Bloomsy Premium - 12 Month Prepay",
  "brand": "BloomsyBox",
  "store": "BloomsyBox.com",
  "price": "100.00",
  "item_type": "Flower Subscription",
  "category":  "Subscription",
  "url":  "https://www.bloomsybox.com",
  "date_purchased": "2024-11-11",
  "event": "mothers_day",
  "estimated_birthday": "Late May or Early June" 
}

parameters.text:
=Below are gift records. Let's try and determine the event of the gift and potentially important dates. Assume gifts bought just before Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, and Christmas are gifts for those holidays. Assume all other gifts are birthday gifts. Assume all gifts are timely purchased, at the latest 1 day before the event. Therefore a gift bought on May 15 is more likely to be a birthday than a Mother's Day gift, since it would be too late. Similarly, a gift on December 28 is too late to be a Christmas gift, February 15 is too late to be a Valentine's Day gift, and June 22 is too late to be a Father's Day gift. Gifts may be purchased in advance, e.g. up to 6 weeks before the event.

<Holiday Dates>
- Mother's Day: May 8 - May 14, varies
- Father's Day: June 15 - June 21, varies
- Christmas Day: December 25
- Valentine's Day: February 14
</Holiday Dates>

For each individual gift item, please update JSON like the following:

{
     "event": "mothers_day" or "fathers_day" or "christmas" or "valentines_day" or "birthday",
     "estimated_birthday": "Early August" or "Mid September" or "Late May or Early June" (if "event" === "birthday", this is likely 1-1.5 weeks after purchase date, otherwise return null),
      <include existing fields>
}

Leave estimated_birthday null if the gift is assigned to an event which is not a birthday.

Return only JSON, nothing else. Do not include triple backticks denoting JSON format, just the raw JSON.

<GIFT DATA>
{{ 
  Object.entries($json || {})
    .map(([k, v]) => `${k}: ${v}`)
    .join('\n')
    .replaceAll("price: 0.00", "price: Unknown")
}}
</GIFT DATA>

Pay special attention to the date. Take a deep breath. Think step-by-step.

json.text:
Hi Christopher,
 
Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

As an active subscriber, you get FREE SHIPPING for any one-time purchases you make at BloomsyBox.com through December 31, 2024!

Use code at checkout:

CNN89T

 

 

ORDER SUMMARY

 Product: Bloomsy Premium - 12 Month Prepay

 Quantity: 1.0

 Price: 0.0 USD

 Subtotal: 0.00 USD
 
 Discount: - 0.00 USD
 
 Shipping: 0.00 USD
 
 Tax: 0.00 USD
 
 Total: 0.00 USD

 

 

CUSTOMER
INFORMATION

DELIVERY INFORMATION Deliver To:
Carol McGarry4023 SW 7th Pl, , Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date: *

 

 

ORDER INFORMATION 

Order Number:987563 

Gift Message: **

DELIVERY INFORMATION
 
Deliver To:
Carol McGarry
4023 SW 7th Pl,
Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date:
 *

ORDER INFORMATION
 
Order Number:
987563
 
Gift Message:
 **

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified. You will receive an email notification once your BloomsyBox has shipped.

You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email. Please contact our Customer Service Team Monday-Friday, 9am-6pm EST, to request any changes: [info@bloomsybox.com |](mailto:info@bloomsybox.com)1-877-422-1316 

Your first bouquet will arrive on the date you selected during checkout. Future monthly deliveries will arrive on or around the same date each month, between Tuesday and Friday. For weekly or bi-weekly subscriptions, your BloomsyBox will be delivered on Tuesdays.

 

* Following your first delivery's arrival, your future shipments will arrive each month according to the delivery date of your first shipment, between Monday-Friday. Weekly and Biweekly orders will be delivered on Tuesdays.

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.
*FREE SHIPPING: Offer valid through 12/31/24. Free Shipping cannot be applied to previous purchases or subscriptions. Valid for one-time purchases only. Free shipping code will be made invalid upon cancellation of BloomsyBox subscription.

 

[FB](https://www.facebook.com/BloomsyBox)
[IG](https://www.instagram.com/Bloomsybox/)

json.subject: Order Confirmation #897111
json.text:
Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

Your first bouquet will arrive on the day you selected during checkout.

For all monthly deliveries, your flowers will arrive on the date you chose for your first shipment, between Tuesday and Friday. If you opted for a weekly or bi-weekly subscription, your flowers will be delivered every Tuesday.

Once your bouquet has shipped, we'll send you a delivery notification email to let you know your flowers are coming.

We understand that sometimes things change, and that's okay! You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email.  Please contact our Customer Service Team during our designated hours (Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST) to see what we can do about the requested changes, rest assured that our team is here to help.

If you need to make any changes, don't hesitate to contact us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

 

 
 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

 

 

 

 

CUSTOMER
INFORMATION

DELIVERY INFORMATION
 
Deliver To:
Carol McGarry
4023 SW 7th Pl,
Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date:
 *

ORDER INFORMATION
 
Order Number:
897111
 
Gift Message:
 **

DELIVERY INFORMATION Deliver To:
Carol McGarry4023 SW 7th Pl, , Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date: *

 

 

ORDER INFORMATION 

Order Number:897111 

Gift Message: **

 

 

* Following your first delivery's arrival, your future shipments will arrive each month according to the delivery date of your first shipment, between Monday-Friday. Weekly and Biweekly orders will be delivered on Tuesdays.

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

ORDER SUMMARY

Bloomsy Premium - 12 Month Prepay

Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

Your first bouquet will arrive on the day you selected during checkout.

For all monthly deliveries, your flowers will arrive on the date you chose for your first shipment, between Tuesday and Friday. If you opted for a weekly or bi-weekly subscription, your flowers will be delivered every Tuesday.

Once your bouquet has shipped, we'll send you a delivery notification email to let you know your flowers are coming.

We understand that sometimes things change, and that's okay! You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email.  Please contact our Customer Service Team during our designated hours (Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST) to see what we can do about the requested changes, rest assured that our team is here to help.

If you need to make any changes, don't hesitate to contact us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

 

 
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

json.subject: Order Confirmation #882525
json.text:
Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

Your first bouquet will arrive on the day you selected during checkout.

For all monthly deliveries, your flowers will arrive on the date you chose for your first shipment, between Tuesday and Friday. If you opted for a weekly or bi-weekly subscription, your flowers will be delivered every Tuesday.

Once your bouquet has shipped, we'll send you a delivery notification email to let you know your flowers are coming.

We understand that sometimes things change, and that's okay! You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email.  Please contact our Customer Service Team during our designated hours (Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST) to see what we can do about the requested changes, rest assured that our team is here to help.

If you need to make any changes, don't hesitate to contact us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

 

 
 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

 

 

 

 

CUSTOMER
INFORMATION

DELIVERY INFORMATION
 
Deliver To:
Carol McGarry
4023 SW 7th Pl,
Cape Coral, FL, 33914

 *

Order Number:882525 

Gift Message: **

 

 

* Following your first delivery's arrival, your future shipments will arrive each month according to the delivery date of your first shipment, between Monday-Friday. Weekly and Biweekly orders will be delivered on Tuesdays.

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

Your first bouquet will arrive on the day you selected during checkout.

For all monthly deliveries, your flowers will arrive on the date you chose for your first shipment, between Tuesday and Friday. If you opted for a weekly or bi-weekly subscription, your flowers will be delivered every Tuesday.

Once your bouquet has shipped, we'll send you a delivery notification email to let you know your flowers are coming.

We understand that sometimes things change, and that's okay! You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email.  Please contact our Customer Service Team during our designated hours (Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST) to see what we can do about the requested changes, rest assured that our team is here to help.

If you need to make any changes, don't hesitate to contact us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

 

 
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for subscribing to BloomsyBox!

Your first bouquet will arrive on the day you selected during checkout.

For all monthly deliveries, your flowers will arrive on the date you chose for your first shipment, between Tuesday and Friday. If you opted for a weekly or bi-weekly subscription, your flowers will be delivered every Tuesday.

Once your bouquet has shipped, we'll send you a delivery notification email to let you know your flowers are coming.

We understand that sometimes things change, and that's okay! You can make changes to your order up to 24 hours after receiving this email.  Please contact our Customer Service Team during our designated hours (Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST) to see what we can do about the requested changes, rest assured that our team is here to help.

If you need to make any changes, don't hesitate to contact us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

 

 
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

json.cleaned_html: body { background-color: #ffffff; margin:0; font:12px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; font:14px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } a img { border:0; } h2 { font-size:20px; line-height:24px; margin:0; padding:0; font-weight:normal; color:#000 !important; } h3 { font-size: 18px; color:#cc6600; margin:15px 0 0 0; font-weight: normal; } h4 { font-size:14px; margin:0; font-weight:normal; } p { margin:1px 0 8px 0; font:12px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } table { border-collapse:collapse; } td { vertical-align: top; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif } /* container */ #container { width:500px; color:#333; margin:0 auto; } /* content tables */ #main, #header, #customerSuggestions, #summary, #orderDetails, #itemDetails, #selfService, #closing, #marketingContent, #legalCopy, #multOrder, #warranty, #criticalInfo, #orderDetailsHeader { width:500px; } body #warranty p { width:100%; } /* main */ #main .customerSuggestions { background-color:#efefef; padding:8px 20px 8px 20px; } #main .customerSuggestions a { text-decoration:underline; color:#006699; } #main .customerSuggestions span { color:#cc6600; font-weight:bold; } #main .customerSuggestionsCallOut { padding: 0px 0px 0px 50px; } #multOrder { background-color: #ffffff; border-color: #f6f7f8; border-radius: 5px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-top: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-bottom: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-right: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-left: 2px solid #f6f7f8; } /* header */ #header { border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; padding-top:10px; padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px; padding-bottom:10px; } /* orderDetailsHeader */ #orderDetailsHeader { border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px; } #logo { } #title { text-align: right; } #title p{ font-size:20px; font-family: "arial", "sans-serif"; } #amazonLogo{ width:107px; height:31px; } /* Greeting Summary */ #greetingSummary { width:100%; padding:0 0 0 0; font-size:14px; } #greetingSummary .greeting{ font-size:18px; line-height:30px; color:#cc6600; } #greetingSummary a{ font-size:12px; } /* critical info */ #criticalInfo { border-top:3px solid #cbcfd4; width: 95%; } #criticalInfo td { font-size: 14px; } #criticalInfo .detailsContent { background-color:#efefef; } #criticalInfo .label { color:#666; } #criticalInfo p { font:14px Arial, sans-serif; } #criticalInfo span { font-size:14px; color:#666; } #criticalInfo a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; font:14px Arial, sans-serif; } #criticalInfo .hbaicon { padding:4px; vertical-align:text-top; } #criticalInfo .hbainfo { text-align:left; padding-left:5px; padding-right:0px; } #criticalInfo .hbamessage { font:13px Arial, sans-serif; color:#000000; text-decoration:none; line-height:125%; } #criticalInfo .hbahref { font:12px Arial, sans-serif; color:#006699; text-decoration:none; line-height:150%; } #criticalInfo .alexa-shopping-content { background-color: rgb(256, 256, 256); padding:0 0 0 0; } #criticalInfo .footer { background-color: rgb(256, 256, 256); padding: 10px 0px 0px 0px; } #criticalInfoBulk .footer p { font: 11px/ 16px Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); } .deferred-payments-separator { border: 1px solid #cbcfd4; } /* buttons */ .button { text-decoration:none !important; display:block; height:26px; display:inline-block; margin:0 0 2px 0; } .button.small { height:20px; } .button .expandable { float:left; overflow:hidden; } .button .text { color:#000f68; font-size:12px; position:relative; z-index:10; top:-22px; left:-12px; text-align:center; } .button.secondary .text { left:0; } .button.small .text { top:-20px; left:0; font-size:11px; } /* supporting details */ #supportingDetails { font-size:11px; color:#666; line-height:14px; margin:10px 20px; } #supportingDetails { margin:0 18px 0 18px; } /* order details */ #orderDetails h3 { border-bottom:1px solid #ccc; margin:0 0 3px 0; padding:0 0 3px 0; } #orderDetails .frame { padding:16px 20px 6px 20px; } #orderDetails .orderDate { color:#666666; font-size:12px; } #orderDetails span { font-size:12px; color:#666; } #orderDetails p { margin:2px 0 9px 0; } /* item details */ #itemDetails { width: 95%; } #itemDetails .photo { width:150px; text-align:center; padding:16px 0 10px 0; } #itemDetails .photo img.hidden { width:115px; height: 115px; background-color: #F0F2F2; } #itemDetails .photo .play img { margin:3px 0 0 0; } #itemDetails .name { color:#666; padding:10px 0 10px 10px; } #itemDetails ul { margin:0; padding:0; } #itemDetails ul li { list-style-type:none; line-height:14px; padding:0 0 4px 0; } #itemDetails ul li a { font-size:14px; } #itemDetails .name p { margin:0; padding:10px 0 0 0; font-size:12px; line-height:16px; } #itemDetails .name p a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; } #itemDetails .name .share { margin:3px 0 15px 0; } #itemDetails .name .share a { margin: 4px 5px 0 0; font-size:0; } #itemDetails .name .supportingDetails, #itemDetails .name .supportingDetails a { margin:8px 0 0 0; font-size:12px; } #itemDetails .price { width:110px; text-align:right; font-size:14px; padding:10px 10px 0 10px; white-space:nowrap; } #itemDetails .price a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; } #itemDetails .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #itemDetails .name table { border-collapse: separate; } #itemDetails .nameSpace table { border-collapse: separate; } #shippingWeight { width:95%; } #shippingWeight td { text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #shippingWeight .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #shippingWeight .shipmentWeightValue { width:120px; } /* cost breakdown */ #costBreakdown { width:50%; } #costBreakdown td { text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #costBreakdown td td { padding-right: unset !important; } #costBreakdown .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #costBreakdown .end { padding:0 0 16px 0; } #costBreakdown .price { font-size:12px; white-space: nowrap; /*width:120px;*/ } #costBreakdown .text { font-size:12px; text-align:left; white-space: nowrap; /*width:120px;*/ } #costBreakdown .total { font-size:14px; text-align:left; font-weight:bold; white-space: nowrap; } #costBreakdown #costBreakdownRight { width:100%; text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #costBreakdown #costBreakdownLeft { width:100%; text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } /* additional shipments */ #additionalShipments { font-size:11px; } #additionalShipments h3 { margin:10px 0 0 0; } #additionalShipments p { margin:10px 20px 0px 20px; } #additionalShipments .orderDate { color:#666666; font-size:12px; } #additionalShipments .details { padding:10px 20px 10px 20px; } #additionalShipments .details .label { color:#666666; font-weight:bold; } #additionalShipments .details .edd, #additionalShipments .details .quantity { font-weight:bold; json.cleaned_html: body { background-color: #ffffff; margin:0; font:12px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; font:14px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } a img { border:0; } h2 { font-size:20px; line-height:24px; margin:0; padding:0; font-weight:normal; color:#000 !important; } h3 { font-size: 18px; color:#cc6600; margin:15px 0 0 0; font-weight: normal; } h4 { font-size:14px; margin:0; font-weight:normal; } p { margin:1px 0 8px 0; font:12px/16px Arial, sans-serif; } table { border-collapse:collapse; } td { vertical-align: top; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif } /* container */ #container { width:500px; color:#333; margin:0 auto; } /* content tables */ #main, #header, #customerSuggestions, #summary, #orderDetails, #itemDetails, #selfService, #closing, #marketingContent, #legalCopy, #multOrder, #warranty, #criticalInfo, #orderDetailsHeader { width:500px; } body #warranty p { width:100%; } /* main */ #main .customerSuggestions { background-color:#efefef; padding:8px 20px 8px 20px; } #main .customerSuggestions a { text-decoration:underline; color:#006699; } #main .customerSuggestions span { color:#cc6600; font-weight:bold; } #main .customerSuggestionsCallOut { padding: 0px 0px 0px 50px; } #multOrder { background-color: #ffffff; border-color: #f6f7f8; border-radius: 5px; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-top: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-bottom: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-right: 2px solid #f6f7f8; border-left: 2px solid #f6f7f8; } /* header */ #header { border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; padding-top:10px; padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px; padding-bottom:10px; } /* orderDetailsHeader */ #orderDetailsHeader { border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px; } #logo { } #title { text-align: right; } #title p{ font-size:20px; font-family: "arial", "sans-serif"; } #amazonLogo{ width:107px; height:31px; } /* Greeting Summary */ #greetingSummary { width:100%; padding:0 0 0 0; font-size:14px; } #greetingSummary .greeting{ font-size:18px; line-height:30px; color:#cc6600; } #greetingSummary a{ font-size:12px; } /* critical info */ #criticalInfo { border-top:3px solid #cbcfd4; width: 95%; } #criticalInfo td { font-size: 14px; } #criticalInfo .detailsContent { background-color:#efefef; } #criticalInfo .label { color:#666; } #criticalInfo p { font:14px Arial, sans-serif; } #criticalInfo span { font-size:14px; color:#666; } #criticalInfo a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; font:14px Arial, sans-serif; } #criticalInfo .hbaicon { padding:4px; vertical-align:text-top; } #criticalInfo .hbainfo { text-align:left; padding-left:5px; padding-right:0px; } #criticalInfo .hbamessage { font:13px Arial, sans-serif; color:#000000; text-decoration:none; line-height:125%; } #criticalInfo .hbahref { font:12px Arial, sans-serif; color:#006699; text-decoration:none; line-height:150%; } #criticalInfo .alexa-shopping-content { background-color: rgb(256, 256, 256); padding:0 0 0 0; } #criticalInfo .footer { background-color: rgb(256, 256, 256); padding: 10px 0px 0px 0px; } #criticalInfoBulk .footer p { font: 11px/ 16px Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); } .deferred-payments-separator { border: 1px solid #cbcfd4; } /* buttons */ .button { text-decoration:none !important; display:block; height:26px; display:inline-block; margin:0 0 2px 0; } .button.small { height:20px; } .button .expandable { float:left; overflow:hidden; } .button .text { color:#000f68; font-size:12px; position:relative; z-index:10; top:-22px; left:-12px; text-align:center; } .button.secondary .text { left:0; } .button.small .text { top:-20px; left:0; font-size:11px; } /* supporting details */ #supportingDetails { font-size:11px; color:#666; line-height:14px; margin:10px 20px; } #supportingDetails { margin:0 18px 0 18px; } /* order details */ #orderDetails h3 { border-bottom:1px solid #ccc; margin:0 0 3px 0; padding:0 0 3px 0; } #orderDetails .frame { padding:16px 20px 6px 20px; } #orderDetails .orderDate { color:#666666; font-size:12px; } #orderDetails span { font-size:12px; color:#666; } #orderDetails p { margin:2px 0 9px 0; } /* item details */ #itemDetails { width: 95%; } #itemDetails .photo { width:150px; text-align:center; padding:16px 0 10px 0; } #itemDetails .photo img.hidden { width:115px; height: 115px; background-color: #F0F2F2; } #itemDetails .photo .play img { margin:3px 0 0 0; } #itemDetails .name { color:#666; padding:10px 0 10px 10px; } #itemDetails ul { margin:0; padding:0; } #itemDetails ul li { list-style-type:none; line-height:14px; padding:0 0 4px 0; } #itemDetails ul li a { font-size:14px; } #itemDetails .name p { margin:0; padding:10px 0 0 0; font-size:12px; line-height:16px; } #itemDetails .name p a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; } #itemDetails .name .share { margin:3px 0 15px 0; } #itemDetails .name .share a { margin: 4px 5px 0 0; font-size:0; } #itemDetails .name .supportingDetails, #itemDetails .name .supportingDetails a { margin:8px 0 0 0; font-size:12px; } #itemDetails .price { width:110px; text-align:right; font-size:14px; padding:10px 10px 0 10px; white-space:nowrap; } #itemDetails .price a { text-decoration:none; color:#006699; } #itemDetails .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #itemDetails .name table { border-collapse: separate; } #itemDetails .nameSpace table { border-collapse: separate; } #shippingWeight { width:95%; } #shippingWeight td { text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #shippingWeight .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #shippingWeight .shipmentWeightValue { width:120px; } /* cost breakdown */ #costBreakdown { width:50%; } #costBreakdown td { text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #costBreakdown td td { padding-right: unset !important; } #costBreakdown .divider { border-top:1px solid #eaeaea; padding:0 0 16px 0; } #costBreakdown .end { padding:0 0 16px 0; } #costBreakdown .price { font-size:12px; white-space: nowrap; /*width:120px;*/ } #costBreakdown .text { font-size:12px; text-align:left; white-space: nowrap; /*width:120px;*/ } #costBreakdown .total { font-size:14px; text-align:left; font-weight:bold; white-space: nowrap; } #costBreakdown #costBreakdownRight { width:100%; text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } #costBreakdown #costBreakdownLeft { width:100%; text-align:right; line-height:18px; padding:0 10px 0 0; } /* additional shipments */ #additionalShipments { font-size:11px; } #additionalShipments h3 { margin:10px 0 0 0; } #additionalShipments p { margin:10px 20px 0px 20px; } #additionalShipments .orderDate { color:#666666; font-size:12px; } #additionalShipments .details { padding:10px 20px 10px 20px; } #additionalShipments .details .label { color:#666666; font-weight:bold; } #additionalShipments .details .edd, #additionalShipments .details .quantity { font-weight:bold; } /* self service */ #selfService .divider { border-top:1px solid #ccc; padding:0 0 16px 0; } /* closing */ #closing { padding:10px 20px 10px 0; border-collapse:none; border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; } #closing p { margin:0; font-size:14px; padding-bottom:5px; } #closing .signature { font-size:14px; font-weight:bold; } #closing td { padding-left: 20px; } /* marketing content */ #marketingContent { border-bottom:1px solid #eaeaea; border-collapse:collapse; padding:0; } #marketingContent td.recs { padding:10px 0; } #marketingContent td.right { padding:10px 15px 10px 0; } #marketingContent td.left { padding:10px 0 10px 15px; } #middleCenterMC { text-align:center; } #middleCenterMC img { width:85%; } /* legal copy */ #legalCopy { padding-top:9px; margin:0 0 0 0; } #legalCopy p { font-size:10px; color:#666; line-height:16px; padding:0 0 0px 0px; font:10px; } #legalCopy a { font-size:10px; font:10px; } /* reg fee */ #regFee td { colspan: "2"; border-top:1px solid #ccc; } .buttonComponent { border-collapse: separate; text-decoration: none !important; line-height: 47px; border-radius: 3px; border-style: solid; border-color: #CBA957; border-width: 1px; background: #F0C354 linear-gradient(#F7DEA2, #F0C354) repeat scroll 0% 0%; background-color: #ffa723; white-space: nowrap; min-width: 222px; json.subject: Order Confirmation #823185
json.text:
Hi Christopher,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

Remember that this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account. If you need to make any changes, please contact us at [info@bloomsybox.com](mailto:info@bloomsybox.com) or call us at [1-877-422-1316](tel:18774221316).

Please get in touch with us within 24 hours, so we can make the changes before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

 

 

 

 

CUSTOMER
INFORMATION

DELIVERY INFORMATION
 
Deliver To:
Carol McGarry
4023 SW 7th Pl,
Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date:
 *

ORDER INFORMATION
 
Order Number:
823185
 
Gift Message:
 **

DELIVERY INFORMATION Deliver To:
Carol McGarry4023 SW 7th Pl, , Cape Coral, FL, 33914

First Delivery Date: *

 

 

ORDER INFORMATION 

Order Number:823185 

Gift Message: **

 

 

* Following your first delivery's arrival, your future shipments will arrive each month according to the delivery date of your first shipment, between Monday-Friday. Weekly and Biweekly orders will be delivered on Tuesdays.

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

ORDER SUMMARY

Product:
Bloomsy Premium - 12 Month Prepay

Quantity: 1.0
 
Price: 0.0 USD

Subtotal: 0.00 USD
 
Discount: - 0.00 USD
 
Shipping: 0.00 USD
 
Tax: 0.00 USD
 
Total: 0.00 USD

Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

Remember that this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account. If you need to make any changes, please contact us at [info@bloomsybox.com](mailto:info@bloomsybox.com) or call us at [1-877-422-1316](tel:18774221316).

Please get in touch with us within 24 hours, so we can make the changes before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

Order Number:822120 

Gift Message: **

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

Remember that this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account. If you need to make any changes, please contact us at info@bloomsybox.com  or call us at 1-877-422-1316.

Please get in touch with us within 24 hours, so we can make the changes before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a shipment confirmation via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

json.subject: Order Confirmation #765661
json.text:
Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

If you need to make changes, email us at [info@bloomsybox.com](mailto: info@bloomsy.com) or call us at 1-877-422-1316. Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

Please keep in mind, this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account.  If you need to make any changes, you will need to contact us.

 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a delivery notification via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

If you need to make changes, email us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316. Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

Please keep in mind, this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account.  If you need to make any changes, you will need to contact us.
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a delivery notification via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

If you need to make changes, email us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316. Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

Please keep in mind, this order can no longer be modified by logging in to your account.  If you need to make any changes, you will need to contact us.
 
 
 
A few things you'll want to remember:
 
All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a delivery notification via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

INFORMATION

DELIVERY INFORMATION

Carol McGarry
4023 SW 7th Pl, , Cape Coral, FL, 33914

12-16-2022 *

 **

** Gift Message will only be included in your first delivery.

json.text:
Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

If you need to make changes, email us at [info@bloomsybox.com](mailto: info@bloomsy.com) or call us at 1-877-422-1316. Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

Hey Carol,
 Thank you for your order!

 

If you need to make changes, email us at [info@bloomsybox.com](mailto: info@bloomsybox.com) or call us at [1-877-422-1316.](tel: 1-877-422-1316.) Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.

 

 

 

A few things you'll want to remember:

Please keep the following in mind

 

 

 

 

[Delivery]

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

 

[Delivery]

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

 

 

[Date]

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a delivery notification via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

Hi Carol,
 

Thank you for being a BloomsyBox subscriber! 

If you need to make changes, email us at info@bloomsybox.com or call us at 1-877-422-1316. Just be sure to contact us within the next 24 hours so we can make the changes in time before your order ships! Our hours are Monday - Friday, 9:00 am - 6:00 pm EST.
Hey Carol,
 
Thank you for your order!

A few things you'll want to remember:
Please keep the following in mind
 
 
 
 

All Next-day delivery orders are final and cannot be canceled or modified.

 

Please keep in mind any changes to your subscription need to be made at least one day before your renewal date to ensure they take effect.

 
 

Once we ship your order, you’ll receive a delivery notification via email. This email will let you know that your flowers are on their way!

} .deferred-payments-separator { border: 1px solid #cbcfd4; } /* buttons */ .button { text-decoration:none !important; display:block; height:26px; display:inline-block; margin:0 0 2px 0; } .button.small { height:20px; } .button .expandable { float:left; overflow:hidden; } .button .text { color:#000f68; font-size:12px; position:relative; z-index:10; top:-22px; left:-12px; text-align:center; } .button.secondary .text { left:0; font-weight:bold; } #additionalShipments .details .edd, #additionalShipments .details .quantity { font-weight:bold; } /* self service */ #selfService .divider { border-top:1px solid #ccc; padding:0 0 16px 0; Hello, Christopher!

Thanks for ordering Crab Cake Cafe and Pike Place Chowder on Goldbelly. A delicious experience will be heading your way soon!
